name: changelingRL
description:
Play as a changeling in a hostile environment! Try to escape this facility full of neurotic tazer-happy humans without sending them into a panicked evacuation.

This is a tiny roguelike (maybe 30 minutes without spoilers, including a couple game overs) built around suspicious AI's. The humans are wary + ready for a threat like you, so it'll take some doing to keep them calm without starving or stranding yourself.
